metadata.title: CVE-2024-26592 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: ksmbd:fix UAF issue in ksmbd_tcp_new_connection() The race is between thehandling of a new TCP connection and its disconnection. It leads to UAF on`struct tcp_transport` in ksmbd_tcp_new_connection() function.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
